bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with retching as its major illness sign. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lu 鹿 quotes Gu jin lu yan Recipe book. Tang era, ca. 7th century. 古今錄驗 : 小 兒噦疾：鹿角粉、大豆末等分，相和乳調，塗乳上飲之 , “For retching ailment in children: Mix equal portions of deer horn powder and soybean powder with milk. Apply to the mother’s breast nipples for [the child to consume] while drinking”.
